attributes.action: enforce the recovery of any and all  unreasonable expense claims made by politicians.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
An unreasonable expense claim would be any not directly connected to the day to day business of being a politician. In the real world how many of us could expect to claim back expenses from our employer for decorating our residence, having someone do our gardening, purchasing luxury items for house and home, a second home? 
ANY and All expenses that have been claimed that are deemed to be unreasonable, dictated by a generally excepted standard and not a series of self dictated rules created by the very same people to whom they would apply, should be paid back by the politicians in question, without exception and without delay, enforced by the courts if necessary.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament. http://www.parliament.uk
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
